duties_responsibilities.duty: Support monthly and year-end financial closes, including assigned journal entries, balance-sheet account reconciliations, accruals, and overall maintenance of general ledger.
Review bank transactions, bank reconciliations and petty cash.
Participate in annual interim and year-end financial audit.
Process AP/AR, check cutting, depositing of client checks and setting up ACHs and wires.
Assist in providing schedules and commentary for general ledger account results and variances.
Prepare special financial reports, when requested by senior managers, by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing account information and trends.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in accounting, business accounting, or finance
